html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-15552017-12-12ECCC, 
ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012
SubjectEnvironmental Assessment -- Murray River Coal Mine project (British Columbia)
PrecisOrder deciding that the significant adverse environmental effects that the Murray River Coal Mine project, 12.5 km southwest of Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, proposed by HD Mining International Ltd., is likely to cause are justified in the circumstances under the CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL ASSESSMENT ACT, 2012.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Environmental Assessment -- Murray River Coal Mine project (British Columbia)
